summary: steve bruce is adamant he can keep hull city in premier league . bruce was targeting 10 wins to survive . steve bruce is confident he will keep hull city in the premier league . they have six games to save their season including nightmare fixtures .
aspect: Steve Bruce believes he can keep Hull City in the Barclays Premier League, despite a 2-0 defeat by Southampton. Hull have six games left, including difficult matches against Liverpool, Arsenal, Tottenham, and Manchester United. Bruce attributes their struggles to several long-term injuries to key players.
